group_1.textRight: Mr. Chairman...!

group_1.textLeft: Woah, you're both here.

group_1.textRight: Is Tatsu okay?!

group_1.textLeft: He's in the hospital now, but his injuries seem@to be nothing serious.

group_1.textRight: Thank goodness...
Getting mixed up in shit just 'cause you're from the@Hikarizuka Youth Association is an everyday thing.
Though, he should've just left him alone...!

group_1.textLeft: Ah... Can't believe he picked a fight just@'cause someone challenged him.

group_1.textRight: About that... did it turn out alright...?!

group_1.textLeft: The newspaper folks were also there. It ain't gonna@be good on us if it ended up in a report...

group_1.textRight: Oh no...

group_1.textLeft: Maybe this will get other sponsors to drop out...
Actually, we've already received a few inquiries@from our sponsors...

group_1.textRight: For real...?!
What are we gonna do, Mr. Chairman...?!

group_1.textCenter: (If the Magical Girl supremacy is spread,@we'd be able to protect the Festival.)
(But with this, it'll be gone before that...!)

group_1.textRight: L-Lady Saaaan...!
We'll lose the Festival sooner than Miyabi and@her friends can succeed in their plans!

group_1.textLeft: No...!@I WON'T let that happen...!

group_1.textRight: But, but!@There's no way to save it...!

group_1.textLeft: Right now, we are going to only think about@this year's Festival.

group_1.textRight: ...Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Let's treat this year's Fire Festival like it's@the last one.
Miyu...
We'll ask your father not to cut off the sponsorship,@just this year.
That way, we can hold off until next year.

group_1.textRight: Whaaa?@But, what are we going to do next year...?!

group_1.textLeft: If the Magical Girl supremacy prevails by next year...
We'll be able to keep the Festival going...!

group_1.textRight: ...Chairman.

group_1.textLeft: What's up...?

group_1.textRight: Let's go see Miyu's father right now.
I'm going to negotiate with him not to cut off@the sponsorship.
...I-I'm coming toooo...!

group_1.textLeft: Even if we do negotiate, we don't have anything@to bargain with...

group_1.textRight: This may sound crazy, but...@I have an idea...!
(This is the only way to preserve the Festival...)
Sorry to barge in at this time of night.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... so, you're here to talk about sponsoring@the Fire Festival, right?

group_1.textRight: Yes...
Please, sir, could you please resume your@sponsorship?
Dad, dad! Please!

group_1.textLeft: Miyu, you've been a great help to me,@and I wish I could do the same for you...
But, if you guys keep causing trouble like this...

group_1.textRight: Even if you discontinue the sponsorship next year,@I wouldn't mind...!
So, just for this year...@I want you to continue the sponsorship...!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800900:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: For next year...
We're planning to clean the Youth Association's@reputation and start from scratch again.
So, I beg you...!
Just this year...!@Let us have the Fire Festival, please...!

group_1.textLeft: Waiâ€”@San! You don't have to kneel down...!

group_1.textRight: Please, Mr. Yukari...!
Just this year, please don't let the young one's fire@go out...
Dad... pleeease...!

group_1.textLeft: ...All right.
If we tell people that this is the last year I'll be@sponsoring, I suppose they'll understand.

group_1.textRight: Thank you so much...!

group_1.narration: This is good... This is it...!
Next year, Magical Girl Supremacy will be spread,@and I'll become a god...@And then the Fire Festival will be saved...!
I won't rely on miracles anymore...!

group_1.textCenter: You only get one wish for a miracle...@The rest you'll have to take care of yourself.
